thread.title: CORRECTING and REPLACING Textron Declares Quarterly Dividend

author: cnbc.com
title: CORRECTING and REPLACING Textron Declares Quarterly Dividend

organizations.name: board of directors of textron inc.

text:
PROVIDENCE, R.I.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- This release corrects the record date for the quarterly dividend. The record date will be March 12, 2018--not March 9, 2018 as originally announced. Second paragraph of release dated February 28, 2018, should read: All dividends will be paid on April 1, 2018 to shareholders of record as of March 12, 2018.
The corrected release reads:
TEXTRON DECLARES QUARTERLY DIVIDEND
The Board of Directors of Textron Inc. (NYSE:TXT) today declared a quarterly dividend of $0.02 per share on the companyâ€™s Common Stock.
All dividends will be paid on April 1, 2018 to shareholders of record as of March 12, 2018.
About Textron Inc.
Textron Inc. is a multi-industry company that leverages its global network of aircraft, defense, industrial and finance businesses to provide customers with innovative solutions and services. Textron is known around the world for its powerful brands such as Bell, Cessna, Beechcraft, Hawker, Jacobsen, Kautex, Lycoming, E-Z-GO, Greenlee, Textron Off Road, Arctic Cat, Textron Systems, and TRU Simulation + Training. For more information visit: www.textron.com
